column1: '''''Amon Hen'' 189''' is the one-hundred-and-eighty-ninth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal [[Amon Hen (journal)
* The Gardens of Middle-earth - Part Four: Heading Out
* Advertisement: "Chosen Destinies" from The Baldric Press
* My mistress went to the Fellowship Festival and all you get is this lousy report
